content: Hi all,I have:Gekko R909 with a replaced noctua fan $500Futurebit BTC Batch 1 with power supply $500Futurebit LTC Batch 1 with power supply $400all units come with power suppliesbuyer pay shipping from USA FloridaI can probably hook them up to post some screenshots of them running if there is interest, they have not ran in a couple months but were fine when I shut them down. I moved and can't afford the power to run them. Will accept BTC or LTC using an approved escrow here on the forum. Thanks!
